item.title: SOUTHERN MISSOURI BANCORP INC 10-K
item.description: SOUTHERN MISSOURI BANCORP INC, which is in the Savings Institutions, Not Federally Chartered [6036] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 13, 2021 had 47248 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: loans - 741 instances company - 583 instances bank - 535 instances 30 - 504 instances june - 467 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
